title: 일상 활동 대화 듣기
description: 일상생활에서 하는 활동에 대한 대화를 듣고 이해합니다.

audio.text: Hi, I'm Sarah. [PAUSE] I wake up at 7 o'clock every morning. [PAUSE] I eat breakfast at 7:30. [PAUSE] Then, I go to school by bus. [PAUSE] After school, I play tennis with my friends. [PAUSE] I love sports!

targetSentences: I wake up at 7 o'clock every morning.
